text: Mickaël Bethe-Selassié (15 February 1951 – 5 December 2020) was an Ethiopian sculptor. He was known for his work in papier mâché. Many of his works were seen at the National Museum of African Art in Washington, D.C.. Bethe-Selassié died on 5 December 2020 in Washington, D.C. at the age of 69.Décès du sculpteur éthiopien Mickaël Bethe-Selassié ==References== ==Other websites== *Biographical sketch *Official Website Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ethiopian people Category:Sculptors
title: Mickaël Bethe-Selassié
